title: New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People              People          A Sampling of Traditional New Orleans Jazz Pioneers Louis "Satchmo" Armstrong Charles "Buddy" Bolden "Papa Jack" George Vetiala Laine Sidney Bechet              Fred Kasten Fred Kasten  WWNO radio producer Fred Kasten interviews legends of New Orleans jazz in his monthly Talkin' Jazz series held at Old U.S. Mint in partnership with the New Orleans Jazz NHP.          Baby Briscoe Photo Courtesy of Tulane University Hogan Jazz Archives  Click here for Dr. Sherrie Tuckers' research study, A Feminist Perspective on New Orleans Jazzwomen        The Jazz Archivist Tulane University Hogan Jazz Archives  Click here to access the online collection published by Tulane University's Hogan Jazz Archives entitled the Jazz Archivist.
